articles.description: Federal funding to underwrite Alcoa's Portland aluminium smelter is hailed as a lifeline for hundreds of workers but a lost opportunity to move towards renewables.
articles.content: A Federal Government commitment of $76.8 million to underwrite Alcoa's giant Victorian aluminium smelter has been hailed as a lifeline for hundreds of workers, but as a lost opportunity to move towar… [+6687 chars]
